title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Competencies: Mixed Reality-Based Scientific Virtual Learning Environment Design: Situated Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can recreate science experiment procedures in 3D simulations within a mixed reality environment.
Learners can analyze and implement real-world science problem-solving scenarios according to situated learning principles.

Using mobile devices and MR-based learning modules (e.g., Microsoft HoloLens2), learners collaborate with 3 peers to complete collaborative diagnosis and treatment planning tasks for 3 simulated patient cases within two weeks. They achieve average ≥4 points on 5-point-scale peer/instructor rubrics
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
